idea-plugin.name: Eclipse Code Formatter
idea-plugin.description: Allows using Eclipse's code formatter directly from IntelliJ. Solves the problem of maintaining a common code style in team environments where both IDEA and Eclipse are used. Also emulates Eclipse's imports optimizing - go to http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-code-formatter-intellij-plugin/wiki/HowTo for instructions how to configure it.
